mapper.select: SELECT S.Id AS SUB_ID, S.YEAR, S.SEMESTER, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME, S.NAME AS SUB_NAME, S.ROOM, S.GRADES, S.TYPE, S.TIME FROM SUBJECT S, DEPARTMENT D WHERE S.DEPT_ID = D.ID AND S.PROFESSOR_ID = #{id}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S.ID) AS IDX, G.RATE AS RATE, S.ID AS STU_ID, S.GRADE AS GRADE, S.SEMESTER, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME, S.NAME AS STU_NAME, S.TEL, S.GENDER FROM STUDENT S JOIN ENROLMENT E ON S.ID = E.STU_ID JOIN SUBJECT T ON E.SUB_ID = T.ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON S.DEPT_ID = D.ID LEFT JOIN GRADE G ON S.ID = G.STU_ID AND E.SUB_ID = G.SUB_ID WHERE T.PROFESSOR_ID = #{userId} AND T.NAME = #{subName} ORDER BY S.ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRADE (ID, STU_ID, SUB_ID, ABSENT, MID_EXAM, FIN_EXAM, EX_SCORE, RATE) VALUES (GRADE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{stuId}, #{subId}, #{absent}, #{midExam}, #{finExam}, #{exScore, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rate})
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY S.ID) AS IDX, G.RATE AS RATE, T.YEAR AS YEAR, T.SEMESTER, T.NAME, T.ROOM, T.GRADES FROM STUDENT S JOIN ENROLMENT E ON S.ID = E.STU_ID JOIN SUBJECT T ON E.SUB_ID = T.ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON S.DEPT_ID = D.ID LEFT JOIN GRADE G ON S.ID = G.STU_ID AND E.SUB_ID = G.SUB_ID WHERE S.ID = #{id} ORDER BY S.ID;
